Taxon name.Name: Saccharomyces cerevisiae
Taxon name.Synonymy:
Current name: Saccharomyces cerevisiae (Desmazières) Meyen 1838 MB#492348 
Basionym: Mycoderma cerevisiae Desmazières 1827 MB#166349 
Obligate synonyms: 
   - Mycokluyveria cerevisiae (Desmazières) Ciferri & Redaelli 1947 MB#288584 
   - Saccharomyces cerevisiae Meyen ex E.C. Hansen 1883 MB#163963 
   - Eutorulopsis cerevisiae (Desmazières) Ciferri & Redaelli 1929 MB#251368 
   - Eutorula cerevisiae (Desmazières) H. Will 1916 MB#535088 
   - Kloeckera cerevisiae (Desmazières) Janke 1923 MB#541144

Substrate of isolation: cylinder-plate assay of nystatin in pharmaceutic preparations
Other culture collection numbers: ATCC 2601; CBS 679; CCRC 20824; DSM 3774; NCYC 853; NRRL Y-53
Nagoya protocol restrictions and complia: no known restrictions under the Nagoya protocol
History: IHEM, 1994 < ATCC < NRRL < F.W. Tanner < CBS < A. Guilliermond
Applications: Cylinder - plate assay of nystatin in pharmaceutic preparations (U.S. Pharmacopeia, 22nd rev., pp. 1488-1493, 1990; Code of Federal Regulations, Title 21, Parts 436 and 446.181, 1987). Assay of amphotericin B (McGinnis, M.R. Laboratory  handbook of medical mycology. New York: Academic Press; 1980: pp. 412-419). No vitamin requirement
